Game works you need this tool to Fix it

Fix Permissions
A pkg to fix file permissions. This should fix problems with black screens and disc read errors when using backup managers.

http://ps3.dashhacks.com/downloads/fix-permissions

Download it Install it (copy the file "FIX_PERMISSIONS_Waninkoko_Kmeaw_CFW_3.55.pkg" to USB Root Go to Install Package File) Run "FIX PERMISSIONS" you just install it Run Backup Manager Select game Run the game

All thanks goes to www.Play-Shqip.com
